channel.title: Questions so many questions
channel.description:
Question #1:
can someone give me the code for a 508 dragon claw spec and emote please.
Question #2:
Can i also get the code for a 508 dragon claw spec and emote please. and more question #1 and 2 can you also tell me where to code it.
Question #3:
Can Somone give me the code to make a item only where staff members can use
Question #4:
Is it possiable to change how high a weapon can hit? like that stats of it and if so can you tell me where i can change it?
Questions #5:
Can someone give me the code for the dragonfire shield special please.
Question #6:
Is it possiable to make a 508 server do barrage without using ancient staff? and if so can you tell me how i can change it.
Question #7:
Can someone give me the 1hp command code
Question #8:
Can someone tell me how to add the spirit shields? or give me the codes and tell me where i place it?
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
So far the questions are over. When or if you post a comment for one of these questions please tell me which question your posting about (ex: Question #5: blah....)
Thank you all who are helping me

item.title: Questions so many questions
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Actually, he shouldn’t split this into multiple threads. I’d help but I honestly have no experience with 508’s.

Read full topic

item.title: Questions so many questions
item.dc:creator: @MobilScape MobilScape
item.description:
@MobilScape wrote:

I think you should make a few posts and split these questions up, No one will answer when they have to read all these at once…

Read full topic
